snippet.title: Think To Die -Trailer
snippet.description:
"Think To Die" is a casual puzzle game where you have to find a way to die. To do so, you have to master different situations, combine objects, and time your actions.

The game starts with a small introduction/tutorial. The more levels you pass, the harder they will become, the more players you will have to kill, the more you will have to think.

Gameplay
The game has over 120 levels and puzzles, waiting to be solved. Furthermore, you have an option to skip any level you like in case you get stuck in one of them.
You can find a video above this description, showing real and unedited gameplay of the tutorial /game- introduction.


Game-Idea
Meanwhile in all other games your main goal is to survive, in "Think To Die" its exactly the other way round. If you love puzzles, classic and old-fashion entertaining games, then this might be one you would enjoy a lot.


Features

    Over 120 levels
    Happy, not distracting background music
    Option to enable/disable Cartoon-Look
    From very easy to very hard levels!
    New and original game idea
    Fast gameplay
    Auto Save
    Excellent performance, even on older low end PCs and laptops
    No paid DLCs
    Single-Pplayer only
    100% playable offline
    Multiple music tracks to prevent boring repetitions

If you are looking for a challenging, funny and hard puzzle or casual game, then this might be a right choice for you!

In addition, to celebrate the release, you can get this game right now and only for a limited time for a very friendly price. You pay what you think is fair :)

Contact: felgc.gamesdevelopment@googlemail.com
